about_the_game:
Rollo Boi is a thrilling controller-based physics puzzle platformer where you take on the role of an adventurous rolling ball. Your mission? Collect coins, unlock powerful abilities, and conquer a vibrant world filled with challenges!

Key Features:

  • Controller-Powered Gameplay: Use the left and right triggers on your Xbox or PlayStation controller to make the ball roll! (Controller recommended but not required.)

  • Explore Diverse Worlds: Embark on an epic journey through 5 unique worlds, each containing 5 challenging levels. That's 25 levels of pure platforming fun!

  • Master Unique Abilities: Roll, Super Jump, and Reverse Gravity to navigate through obstacles and reach new heights. Unlock a new power-up at the end of each world to aid you in your adventure.

  • Engaging Puzzle Mechanics: Solve intricate puzzles and use physics to your advantage to progress through the game.

  • Eye-Popping Neon Aesthetics: Immerse yourself in a stunning neon-colored world that brings the game to life.

Are you ready to roll through this mesmerizing adventure and prove your skills? Dive into Rollo Boi now and experience the excitement firsthand!
